document.full_text: steve wozniak would consider returning to an active role at apple, the company he co-founded, and believes the consumer electronics giant could afford to be more open than it is, he told reuters.
document.title: steve wozniak says would consider return to apple
lines_and_colors: steve wozniak would consider returning to an active role at apple, the company he co-founded, and believes the consumer electronics giant could afford to be more open than it is, he told reuters.
